footer.brandDescription: Namamy brings you the finest quality makhana (fox nuts) sourced directly from the lotus farms of Bihar. Our premium snacks are roasted to perfection, ensuring maximum nutrition and irresistible taste.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get the latest offers and health tips

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: From the lotus farms of Bihar to your table, discover how we're revolutionizing healthy snacking with premium makhana.

story.title: How It All Started
story.paragraph1: Our journey began in 2020 with a simple mission: to bring the finest quality makhana from the traditional lotus farms of Bihar to health-conscious consumers across India.
story.paragraph2: We recognized that makhana, also known as fox nuts, was an incredibly nutritious superfood that deserved better recognition. Rich in protein, low in calories, and packed with essential minerals, these lotus seeds have been a treasured snack in Indian households for centuries.
story.paragraph3: Today, we work directly with local farmers, ensuring fair trade practices while maintaining the highest quality standards. Every batch of Namamy makhana is carefully selected, processed, and roasted to perfection to deliver the ultimate snacking experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide premium quality, healthy and delicious makhana snacks while supporting local farmers and promoting sustainable agriculture practices.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become India's most trusted brand for healthy snacking, inspiring people to make better food choices for a healthier lifestyle.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
values.qualityDesc: We never compromise on quality, from sourcing to packaging
values.sustainabilityDesc: Supporting sustainable farming and eco-friendly practices
values.healthDesc: Promoting healthy eating habits through nutritious snacks
values.communityDesc: Empowering local farmers and supporting rural communities

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in our growth story
timeline.foundedDesc: Started with a vision to bring premium makhana to every household
timeline.firstProductDesc: Launched our signature roasted makhana with traditional flavors
timeline.expansionDesc: Introduced flavored varieties and premium gift collections
timeline.milestoneDesc: Reached a major milestone of serving over 50,000 happy customers
timeline.innovationDesc: Continuing to innovate with new flavors and sustainable packaging

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions
faq.orderQuestions: How can I track my order?
faq.orderAnswers: You can track your order using the order ID sent to your email, or contact our support team for assistance.
faq.productAnswers: Yes, all our makhana products are made from organically grown lotus seeds without any artificial preservatives.
faq.shippingAnswers: We offer free shipping on orders above ₹500. For orders below ₹500, shipping charges apply based on location.
faq.returnAnswers: We accept returns within 7 days of delivery for unopened products. Contact us for return instructions.
